short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays the tweets of any public Twitter user with configuration possible via the Options page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TweetPuller is a simple Chrome extension to display the first 10 - 40 tweets for a given twitter user and allows you to quickly look at the last tweets from a particular user.  


Changelog:

v0.7: Made the extension compatible with Twitter's api.

v0.6: you can now view several tweets from different users in the same session, use the "Options" pages increase the default number (10) of tweets seen, turn image viewing on/off and create a 'saved' user.

The program should also give you helpful messages when you try to view a proected user's page or a nonexistent user's page.  Feedback and suggestions for improvement are welcome here: https://groups.google.com/d/forum/tweetpuller

Screenshots: http://imgur.com/a/AnVYC
